Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep1
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep81
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep139
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Aku Yang Dinikahi, Dia Yang Dinafkahi
programme.desc: Maura nampaknya membuat kesalahan dalam memilih suami seperti Marchel yang lebih memperhatikan bekas isterinya yang bernama Lidya. Dengan berbohong tentang penyakit kanser, Lidya berjaya merampas harta Marchel. Sebenarnya Maura mengetahui tentang rancangan licik Lidya dan mencuba untuk membongkarinya, tetapi Marchel masih mempercayai Lidya. Bagaimanakah kelanjutan kisah keluarga Maura dan March

Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret Of Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective investigates a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country, uncovering disturbing secrets that link the murders to a massive conspiracy that will shake the whole nation.

programme.title: Sunflower
programme.desc: A former gangster released from prison wants to live a quiet life with his family. However, his efforts are threatened when a politician seeks to knock the family restaurant down to build a mall.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.desc: The drama tells that under the new situation of international anti-terrorism, a temporary form an anti-terrorist special team mixed with intelligent men and women with high IQ, high education and high standards, trained to fight in blood and fire, battle with violent terrorists, to face the life and death. A story of self-experience, growth and transformation.

programme.title: Te Zhan Xing Dong Ep35
programme.desc: The drama tells that under the new situation of international anti-terrorism, a temporary form an anti-terrorist special team mixed with intelligent men and women with high IQ, high education and high standards, trained to fight in blood and fire, battle with violent terrorists, to face the life and death. A story of self-experience, growth and transformation.

programme.title: On the Way Ep68
programme.desc: A large-scale tourism programme that is designed to present rich tourism resources in China and around the world

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep115
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep56
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46294630
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2043
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3615
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep157
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1818
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1042
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Love on a Diet
programme.desc: Mini's broken heart leads her to pack on the pounds. She meets an obese man named Fatso who helps her get back on track and shed the pounds. After dropping the unwanted heft, Mini rekindles her relationship with her first love, but is this the happy ending that she wants?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: Qian, a rich boy obsessed with martial arts, joins a Kung Fu school where he meets and falls for the youngest daughter of the school master. Being a normal student, he meets a mysterious man who teaches him kung fu that allows him to win a duel and marry his love. It is then that the mysterious man's identity is finally revealed.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming’s guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous “Finger of Doom”, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu’s lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li’s father…

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Garden Lane
programme.desc: Eric and Elin were both children to drug addict parents and had traumatic childhoods. As adults, they serendipitously meet at a funeral. As they relive the ghosts of their past, they struggle to find strength in one another as they once did as kids.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Timun Mas
programme.desc: After striking a deal with a giant, a widow sees her dream of having a child fulfilled. The child born from a giant golden fruit, who has now grown up, must fight to change her fate of being given back to the giant.

programme.title: A Summer in the Vltava
programme.desc: After initially turning down an assignment to investigate whether a child is taken care of by her father, as children are not really her thing, Sophie reconsiders it when she needs an escape after her boyfriend suggests starting a family.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S24 Ep7
programme.desc: Dead Ball - When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect’s past to uncover additional victims. Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers marooned at a desolate motel begin to die one by one.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: Right At Your Door
programme.desc: With Los Angeles under sieges by toxic bombs, Brad and Lexi struggle to survive with little supply, limited time and no information.

programme.title: Meeting Evil
programme.desc: Follows disillusioned young family man John as a mysterious stranger, Richie takes him on a murder-fueled ride that transforms the weak-willed John into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: A bank clerk leading a seemingly uneventful life in a quiet little town finds his life suddenly changed after a local train accident threatens to reveal his biggest secret.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesn't die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys 1 (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Hue to Halong Bay - Michael Portillo travels through the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Near the formidable imperial city of Hue, Michael meets milliner Mrs Ngo, who teaches him how to make the iconic conical hat.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads 4 (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Turkey - Long-term mates Joe Wilkinson and Zoe Lyons - who've travelled to gigs together for years - take on the wilds of eastern Turkey.

programme.title: Got Science? 1 (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: It's Not Just You - This episode handpicks a bunch of experiences that are common to human beings, no matter what age, lifestyle or cultural background they come from. It makes a great case to prove that - you are not the only one and there are others just like you.

programme.title: Got Science? 1 (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Science of Sport - This episode features the million questions we tend to ask ourselves every time we watch an excellent game of sport, bringing the science behind sporting action.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands 1 (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Borneo - A journey from Borneo's rich coral reefs, through lush jungles to its mountainous heart, revealing why this island is home to a greater variety of life than almost any other.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall 2 (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Saudi Arabia - Steve Backshall and his team travel to Saudi Arabia to explore rock formations and underground lava caves.

programme.desc: Your Health and More - One could be mildly interested in the topic of health or a bracketed health conscious cookie - this episode has something for everyone. It has a bouquet of stories that are current and relevant, curated to pique interest.

programme.title: Got Science? 1 (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Growing Up - A dozen external voices, old wives' tales and gentle advice come along as a person takes the journey from childhood into adulthood. This episode targets the confusion with various stories, helping in clearing the fog around many theories.

programme.title: Baby Chimp Rescue 1 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Miracles Can Happen - Jim and Jenny Desmond never planned to become surrogate parents to 21 chimpanzees, but now their home is bursting at the seams with rescued baby chimps.

programme.desc: Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan - This final episode sees Joanna Lumley travel across the post-Soviet, Central Asian states of Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan, the heartland of the Silk Road.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Norway - The next few weeks on Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild will see the presenter pay visits to previous contributors to the series - and tonight he travels to Norway to catch up with former Stone Age host Lynx, who now lives in the Norwegian wilderness.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts

programme.title: Inside the Factory 4 (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Coffee - Gregg Wallace is in Derbyshire at an enormous coffee factory where they produce 175,000 jars of instant coffee every day.

programme.title: Earth from Space 1 (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Colourful Planet - From space Earth is a kaleidoscope. Turquoise plankton blooms trigger a feeding frenzy, China turns yellow with rapeseed flowers, and mysterious green lights appear in the ocean.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green 1 (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Northumberland - Robson is in his home county of Northumberland in search of the British staple: scampi.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters 1 (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hurricanes - We investigate two of the most devastating Hurricanes of modern times: Hurricane Katrina, which struck the Gulf Coast of America in 2005, and Hurricane Maria which hit Puerto Rico in 2017.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman 1 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Venezuela - Robson Green heads to Venezuela to catch three kinds of billfish, before meeting a 20-ton whale shark.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Episode 6 - Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts - A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs can’t grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundy’s surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the world’s fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts - A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Episode 7 - Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundy’s surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the world’s fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Episode 9 - Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom - For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australia’s dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Episode 10 - Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Episode 11 - Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can’t walk, and see how the medical team ensures he’ll be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep5
programme.desc: De Hoop: Place of Hope - This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep1
programme.desc: And So it Begins… - Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Oceans - Australia is home to the world’s most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it’s a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Tokyo - In Tokyo Donal visits Asakusa Market surrounding the world's most popular religious site, the Buddhist temple of Sensoji. Inspired by the green tea flavours he finds there, he searches out the Koso-an tea house, one of Tokyo's hidden gems.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year (S6) Ep2
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud, Damion Burrows and Michelle Ogundehin explore five houses demonstrating exceptional craftsmanship, including a Scandi-Scottish lochside bolthole.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Lanesborough, London - In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler ​service. ​Despite its extreme luxury, Giles and Monica discover a friendly staff that make staying at The Lanesborough feel like being home from home for their wealthy and famous guests.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Homes - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode, we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious homes.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Okinawa, Kyoto and Hiroshima - Paul Hollywood continues his culinary journey across Japan. He boards the bullet train, visits Okinawa and gets a cookery lesson from an atomic bomb survivor in Hiroshima.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S9) Ep8
programme.desc: Danish Week - The bakers face unfamiliar recipes as they battle to impress Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood. There's a bread challenge Signature where they must demonstrate style as well substance.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year (S6) Ep2
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud, Damion Burrows and Michelle Ogundehin explore five houses demonstrating exceptional craftsmanship, including a Scandi-Scottish lochside bolthole.

programme.desc: Marina Bay Sands, Singapore - Giles Coren and Monica Galetti join the 9,500-strong workforce in one of the world's biggest hotels, Singapore's Marina Bay Sands.

programme.title: Simply Italian (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Linguine, Farfalle, Bologna, Ragu - Michela Chiappa shows how easy it is to make pasta at home and visits Bologna to look into what makes pasta great.

programme.desc: It's Pastry Day and the first heat of junior bakers recreate an unlikely object in pastry form with a Caribbean-spiced twist, and choux pastry scenes featuring themselves - a Selfie-Clair!

programme.desc: Semi Final - The remaining bakers are just three patisserie challenges away from the biggest day in their baking lives. But the heat is really on now from Signature to Showstopper.

programme.desc: Graham is joined by Kate Winslet, Sir Lenny Henry, Nadiya Hussain and Jack Whitehall. With music from Olly Murs.

programme.desc: Mashpi Lodge, Ecuador - Giles Coren and Monica Galetti head to the Andean Cloud Forest of Ecuador to work at Mashpi Lodge, a $10-million modernist hotel.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: On the wild north Atlantic coast, Rick heads out to sea to go fishing for lobsters with his old friend and celebrity chef Nathan Outlaw, before helping to cook up a lobster risotto.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S6) Ep6
programme.desc: It's Cake Day for the second heat of junior bakers, as they tackle a tricky construction challenge in their first Technical and a showstopping cupcake scene for someone they love.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S9) Ep10
programme.desc: The Final - Paul and Prue set three challenges to test the bakers' skills, including an intricate, multi-layered landscape Showstopper that could win them the title.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Post Office, Wickwar - Peter and Julia loved the Post Office they ran for 20 years so much that, when they were forced to close it, they decided to convert it into their new home.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: On the wild north Atlantic coast, Rick heads out to sea to go fishing for lobsters with his old friend and celebrity chef Nathan Outlaw, before helping to cook up a lobster risotto.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S5) Ep6

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents “Chance,” a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep48
programme.desc: Wacky Weekday / Hike Caramba! - The Harvey Girls are splitting up for the day, but they've accidentally swapped suitcases -- and personalities! Dot trains to become a Trout Master.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep48
programme.desc: The Ants And The Grasshoppers/Don'T Feed The Troll - The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher It! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep3
programme.desc: Wad Of Friendship/Twig Puts Down Roots - Berry and Rocksy are thrilled about spending every waking moment together when they get stuck to the same piece of gum, but as more people join their gum ball, things spiral out of control. \ When Twig begins to root, he thinks his dreams of becoming a Mighty Oak Tree are finally coming true! But as the Mighty Ones observe his "roots" growing in a weird and gross manner, they try to convince Twig that maybe things aren't what they seem.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep66
programme.desc: Save The Town - When Puss and the gang return from the netherworld to find San Lorenzo overrun by thieves, they strike out to find the missing villagers

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep53
programme.desc: Living On The Edge - With their enemies defeated and the volcano erupting on Dragon's Edge, the riders decide to return to Berk but Hiccup discovers that the Dragon Hunters are still out there

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays With Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep29
programme.desc: Pea Dummy / Mary Anning - When Peabody and Sherman take an intelligence test, Peabody can't believe he scores much lower than Sherman and desperately tries to figure out why

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky And The Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep60

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7

He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
